name: Adventure with a yandere
description:
An interactive game about the adventure of Ayato,an antisocial kid.This project is a work of fiction and any resemblance are coincidental.The designer of the game is Sergiu and the programmer is Silviu.If you have any question or if you want to donate some money to help us improve the quality of future games or create other projects like this,you can contact us on Skype:silviuh864.We wish you will like the game!!!We do not own any of the images shown in-game,if you find that you own,you can contact us on our skype.

It's our first ever game.
